body.p: The undersigned Citizens of Henry County: Would petition Yr. Excelency the Governor of Kentucky, that at the Sept. Term of the Henry Circuit Court a Judgment or fine was imposed against William Mathews on an Indictment agt. him for shooting at William Edwards in Sudden heat or passion- that no wounding or hurt was inflicted- Many who sign this petition are knowing by statement and otherwise to the facts of the case- and to the paculiar circumstances of the case that did not come out in the evidence- they believe that this case is one, that recommends it to Yr mercy & clemency We know the parties well. Be pleased wherefore to remit the fine of Seventy five dollars & We Will be more than Satisfied- public Justice here is Satisfied- Dec. 17, 1863

J W
